title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Filecoin (FIL) Gains 2.3% as Index Trades Flat
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Polygon (POL) was also a top performer, gaining 1.4% from Thursday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2446.91, up 0.1% (+2.11) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

Six of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: FIL (+2.3%) and POL (+1.4%).

Laggards: APT (-5.0%) and AAVE (-2.6%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading nearly flat with only 0.1% gain and mixed individual cryptocurrency performances.
